00033 void
00034 MaintenancePrioritizerLowMemory::prioritize(RangeStatsVector &range_data,
00035                                             int64_t memory_needed,
00036                                             String &trace_str) {
00037   RangeStatsVector range_data_root;
00038   RangeStatsVector range_data_metadata;
00039   RangeStatsVector range_data_user;
00040 
00041   for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00042     if (range_data[i]->range->is_root())
00043       range_data_root.push_back(range_data[i]);
00044     else if (range_data[i]->table_id == 0)
00045       range_data_metadata.push_back(range_data[i]);
00046     else
00047       range_data_user.push_back(range_data[i]);
00048   }
00049 
00050 
00054   if (!range_data_root.empty())
00055     assign_priorities(range_data_root, Global::root_log,
00056                       Global::log_prune_threshold_min,
00057                       memory_needed, trace_str);
00058 
00059 
00063   if (!range_data_metadata.empty())
00064     assign_priorities(range_data_metadata, Global::metadata_log,
00065                       Global::log_prune_threshold_min,
00066                       memory_needed, trace_str);
00067 
00068 
00072   int64_t prune_threshold = (int64_t)(m_stats.mbps() * (double)Global::log_prune_threshold_max);
00073 
00074   if (prune_threshold < Global::log_prune_threshold_min)
00075     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_min;
00076   else if (prune_threshold > Global::log_prune_threshold_max)
00077     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_max;
00078 
00079   trace_str += String("STATS user log prune threshold\t") + prune_threshold + "\n";
00080 
00081   if (!range_data_user.empty())
00082     assign_priorities(range_data_user, Global::user_log, prune_threshold,
00083                       memory_needed, trace_str);
00084 
00085 }

00087 namespace {
00088 
00089   class StatsRec {
00090   public:
00091     StatsRec(AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *agdata_,
00092              Range::MaintenanceData *rangedata_) : 
00093       agdata(agdata_), rangedata(rangedata_) { }
00094     AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *agdata;
00095     Range::MaintenanceData *rangedata;
00096   };
00097 
00098   struct StatsRecOrderingDescending {
00099     bool operator()(const StatsRec &x, const StatsRec &y) const {
00100       return x.agdata->mem_used > y.agdata->mem_used;
00101     }
00102   };
00103 
00104 }

00107 
00108 void
00109 MaintenancePrioritizerLowMemory::assign_priorities(RangeStatsVector &range_data,
00110               CommitLog *log, int64_t prune_threshold,
00111               int64_t &memory_needed, String &trace_str) {
00112   AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *ag_data;
00113   int64_t disk_total, mem_total;
00114   std::vector<StatsRec> ag_range_stats;
00115   int64_t memory_freed = 0;
00116 
00117   for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00118 
00119     if (range_data[i]->busy)
00120       continue;
00121 
00122     if (range_data[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00123         range_data[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00124       HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because mid-split(%d)",
00125                range_data[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), range_data[i]->state);
00126       range_data[i]->needs_split = true;
00127       range_data[i]->priority = 3000;
00128       range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory = 0;
00129       for (ag_data = range_data[i]->agdata; ag_data; ag_data = ag_data->next) {
00130         if (range_data[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED)
00131           memory_freed += ag_data->mem_used;
00132         range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory +=
00133           ag_data->ag->purgeable_index_memory(m_stats.starting_access_counter());
00134       }
00135       memory_freed += range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory;
00136       continue;
00137     }
00138 
00139     mem_total = 0;
00140     disk_total = 0;
00141     range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory = 0;
00142 
00143     for (ag_data = range_data[i]->agdata; ag_data; ag_data = ag_data->next) {
00144       disk_total += ag_data->disk_used;
00145       range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory +=
00146         ag_data->ag->purgeable_index_memory(m_stats.starting_access_counter());
00147       ag_range_stats.push_back(StatsRec(ag_data, range_data[i]));
00148     }
00149     memory_freed += range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory;
00150 
00151     if (!range_data[i]->range->is_root()) {
00152       if (range_data[i]->table_id == 0 && Global::range_metadata_split_size != 0) {
00153         if (disk_total >= Global::range_metadata_split_size) {
00154           HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because dist_total %d exceeds %d",
00155                    range_data[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), (int)disk_total, (int)Global::range_metadata_split_size);
00156           mem_total = range_data[i]->compactable_memory();
00157           memory_freed += mem_total;
00158           range_data[i]->priority = 2000 + Math::log2(mem_total);
00159           range_data[i]->needs_split = true;
00160         }
00161       }
00162       else {
00163         if (disk_total >= Global::range_split_size) {
00164           HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because dist_total %d exceeds %d",
00165                    range_data[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), (int)disk_total, (int)Global::range_split_size);
00166           mem_total = range_data[i]->compactable_memory();
00167           memory_freed += mem_total;
00168           range_data[i]->priority = 1000 + Math::log2(mem_total);
00169           range_data[i]->needs_split = true;
00170         }
00171       }
00172     }
00173   }
00174 
00175   if (memory_freed < memory_needed) {
00176 
00177     struct StatsRecOrderingDescending order_desc;
00178 
00179     sort(ag_range_stats.begin(), ag_range_stats.end(), order_desc);
00180 
00181     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_range_stats.size(); i++) {
00182       if (memory_freed >= memory_needed || 
00183           ag_range_stats[i].agdata->mem_used == 0)
00184         break;
00185       if (!ag_range_stats[i].rangedata->needs_split) {
00186         ag_range_stats[i].rangedata->compact_memory +=
00187           ag_range_stats[i].agdata->mem_used;
00188         memory_freed += ag_range_stats[i].agdata->mem_used;
00189         ag_range_stats[i].agdata->ag->set_compaction_bit();
00190         ag_range_stats[i].rangedata->needs_compaction = true;
00191       }
00192     }
00193 
00194   }
00195 
00196   for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00197     if (range_data[i]->needs_compaction)
00198       range_data[i]->priority = Math::log2( (uint32_t)(range_data[i]->compact_memory & 0xFFFFFFFFLL) );
00199   }
00200 
00201   if (memory_freed > memory_needed)
00202     memory_needed = 0;
00203   else
00204     memory_needed -= memory_freed;
00205 
00206 }
